bill.title: Distinctive motor vehicle license tags; authorize for various purposes.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of Friends Of Jackson County Animal Shelter Pets; To Prescribe An Additional Fee For The Issuance Of Such License Tags; O Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The National Law Enforcement Officers Memorial Fund; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The Lawrence County School District; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The Pass Christian School District; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The Mississippi Vision Foundation; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The Mississippi Band Of Choctaw Indians; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The State Board Of Cosmetology; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of Meridian High School; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The Pontotoc City School District; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of Moss Point High School; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of Forest High School; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of Mississippi Motosteps Motorcycle Safety Training; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The Choctaw County Chargers; To Authorize The Issuance Of A Distinctive License Tag Honoring Fallen Law Enforcement Officers And Designating The Motor Vehicle Owner As A Supporter Of The Law Enforcement Officers And Fire Fighters Death Benefits Trust Fund; To Amend Section 27-19-44, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt The Distinctive License Tag From The Requirement That In Order For The Tag To Be Produced, Proof That A Certain Number Of The Tags Will Be Purchased And An Amount Necessary To Pay For The Tags Must Be Submitted To The Department Of Revenue Within Three Years Of The Tag's Authorization; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The Mississippi Wildlife Enforcement Officers' Association, Inc.; To Authorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of West Lauderdale High School; To Provide For The Distribution Of The Additional Fees Collected; To Amend Section 27-19-56.7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reauthorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags Displaying The Emblem Of A Public Junior College Or Community College In This State; To Amend Section 27-19-56.15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reauthorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags That Display The Emblems Of Universities Located In Other States; To Provide That A Portion Of The Fees Collected From The Issuance Of Distinctive License Tags Displaying The Emblem Of Clemson University Shall Be Distributed To The University; To Amend Section 27-19-56.133, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reauthorize The Issuance Of Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags To Supporters Of The Boys And Girls Clubs; To Amend Section 27-19-56.14, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Persons To Whom The Grand Lodge Of Mississippi, Free And Accepted Masons, Distinctive License Tag May Be Issued; To Amend Section 27-19-56.27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tags Supporting The Department Of Marine Resources Shall Be Issued To Supporters Of Mississippi Marine Life Rather Than The Mississippi Seafood Industry And To Require Fees Collected From The Issuance Of The License Tags To Be Deposited Into The Mississippi Marine Life Program Account Within The Seafood Fund Rather Than The Mississippi Seafood Marketing Program Account; To Amend Section 49-15-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; To Amend Section 27-19-56.22, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize An Optional Distinctive Motor Vehicle License Tag Design For Members Of Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-35, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For License Tags For Motorcycles, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-47.1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags For Antique Motorcycles, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-48, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Personalized License Tags, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-49, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special Motorcycle License Tags For Members Of Shrine Motorcycle Clubs, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags To Persons With Disabilities, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56.5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags To Pearl Harbor Survivors And Purple Heart Recipients, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56.9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags To Persons Who Are Deaf, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56.125, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Distinctive Motorcycle License Tags To Veterans Of The Armed Forces, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Title Suff Do Pass Comm Sub
Title Suff Do Pass As Amended
